verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came בִּימֵי֙ <WH3117> And it came to pass in the days אַמְרָפֶ֣ל <WH569> of Amraphel מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king שִׁנְעָ֔ר <WH8152> of Shinar אַרְי֖וֹךְ <WH746> Arioch מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king אֶלָּסָ֑ר <WH495> of Ellasar כְּדָרְלָעֹ֙מֶר֙ <WH3540> Chedorlaomer מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king עֵילָ֔ם <WH5867> of Elam וְתִדְעָ֖ל <WH8413> and Tidal מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> king גּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> of nations

עָשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> [That these] made מִלְחָמָ֗ה <WH4421> war אֶת־ <WH854> with בֶּ֙רַע֙ <WH1298> Bera מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king סְדֹ֔ם <WH5467> of Sodom וְאֶת־ <WH854> and with בִּרְשַׁ֖ע <WH1306> and with Birsha מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king עֲמֹרָ֑ה <WH6017> of Gomorrah שִׁנְאָ֣ב ׀ <WH8134> Shinab מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king אַדְמָ֗ה <WH126> of Admah וְשֶׁמְאֵ֙בֶר֙ <WH8038> and Shemeber מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king [צְבֹיִים כ] (צְבֹויִ֔ים <WH6636> Zeboiim ק) וּמֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> and the king בֶּ֖לַע <WH1106> of Bela הִיא־ <WH1931> which is צֹֽעַר׃ <WH6820> Zoar

כָּל־ <WH3605> All אֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> these חָֽבְר֔וּ <WH2266> All these were joined together אֶל־ <WH413> to עֵ֖מֶק <WH6010> in the vale הַשִּׂדִּ֑ים <WH7708> of Siddim ה֖וּא <WH1931> which יָ֥ם <WH3220> sea הַמֶּֽלַח׃ <WH4417> is the salt

שְׁתֵּ֤ים <WH8147> both עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <WH6240> ten שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years עָבְד֖וּ <WH5647> had served אֶת־ <WH853> כְּדָרְלָעֹ֑מֶר <WH3540> Chedorlaomer וּשְׁלֹשׁ־ <WH7969> three עֶשְׂרֵ֥ה <WH6240> ten שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> year מָרָֽדוּ׃ <WH4775> they rebelled

וּבְאַרְבַּע֩ <WH702> four עֶשְׂרֵ֨ה <WH6240> teen שָׁנָ֜ה <WH8141> year בָּ֣א <WH935> came כְדָרְלָעֹ֗מֶר <WH3540> Chedorlaomer וְהַמְּלָכִים֙ <WH4428> and the kings אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after אִתּ֔וֹ <WH854> for וַיַּכּ֤וּ <WH5221> that [were] with him and smote אֶת־ <WH853> רְפָאִים֙ <WH7497> the Rephaims בְּעַשְׁתְּרֹ֣ת קַרְנַ֔יִם <WH6255> in Ashteroth Karnaim וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַזּוּזִ֖ים <WH2104> and the Zuzims בְּהָ֑ם <WH1990> in Ham וְאֵת֙ <WH853> הָֽאֵימִ֔ים <WH368> and the Emims בְּשָׁוֵ֖ה <WH7740> Shaveh קִרְיָתָֽיִם׃ <WH7156> Kiriathaim

וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַחֹרִ֖י <WH2752> And the Horites בְּהַרְרָ֣ם <WH2022> their Mount שֵׂעִ֑יר <WH8165> Seir עַ֚ד <WH5704> far אֵ֣יל פָּארָ֔ן <WH364> unto Elparan אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> which [is] by הַמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> the wilderness

וַ֠יָּשֻׁבוּ <WH7725> And they returned וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <WH935> and came אֶל־ <WH413> to עֵ֤ין מִשְׁפָּט֙ <WH5880> Enmishpat הִ֣וא <WH1931> he קָדֵ֔שׁ <WH6946> which [is] Kadesh וַיַּכּ֕וּ <WH5221> and smote אֶֽת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all שְׂדֵ֖ה <WH7704> all the country הָעֲמָלֵקִ֑י <WH6003> of the Amalekites וְגַם֙ <WH1571> and also אֶת־ <WH853> הָ֣אֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> and also the Amorites הַיֹּשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> that dwelt בְּחַֽצְצֹ֥ן תָּמָֽר׃ <WH2688> in Hazezontamar

וַיֵּצֵ֨א <WH3318> And there went out מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king סְדֹ֜ם <WH5467> of Sodom וּמֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> and the king עֲמֹרָ֗ה <WH6017> of Gomorrah וּמֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> and the king אַדְמָה֙ <WH126> of Admah וּמֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> and the king [צְבֹיִים כ] (צְבֹויִ֔ם <WH6636> Zeboiim ק) וּמֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> and the king בֶּ֖לַע <WH1106> of Bela הִוא־ <WH1931> (the same צֹ֑עַר <WH6820> Zoar וַיַּֽעַרְכ֤וּ <WH6186> arrayed אִתָּם֙ <WH854> against מִלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> battle בְּעֵ֖מֶק <WH6010> with them in the vale הַשִּׂדִּֽים׃ <WH7708> of Siddim

אֵ֣ת <WH854> against כְּדָרְלָעֹ֜מֶר <WH3540> With Chedorlaomer מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king עֵילָ֗ם <WH5867> of Elam וְתִדְעָל֙ <WH8413> and with Tidal מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king גּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> of nations וְאַמְרָפֶל֙ <WH569> and Amraphel מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king שִׁנְעָ֔ר <WH8152> of Shinar וְאַרְי֖וֹךְ <WH746> and Arioch מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king אֶלָּסָ֑ר <WH495> of Ellasar אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <WH702> four מְלָכִ֖ים <WH4428> kings אֶת־ <WH854> against הַחֲמִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH2568> with five

וְעֵ֣מֶק <WH6010> And the vale הַשִׂדִּ֗ים <WH7708> of Siddim בֶּֽאֱרֹ֤ת <WH875> [was full of] בֶּאֱרֹת֙ <WH875> pits חֵמָ֔ר <WH2564> of tar וַיָּנֻ֛סוּ <WH5127> fled מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> and the kings סְדֹ֥ם <WH5467> of Sodom וַעֲמֹרָ֖ה <WH6017> and Gomorrah וַיִּפְּלוּ־ <WH5307> and fell שָׁ֑מָּה <WH8033> who וְהַנִּשְׁאָרִ֖ים <WH7604> there and they that remained הֶ֥רָה <WH2022> to the mountain נָּֽסוּ׃ <WH5127> fled

וַ֠יִּקְחוּ <WH3947> And they took אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all רְכֻ֨שׁ <WH7399> all the goods סְדֹ֧ם <WH5467> of Sodom וַעֲמֹרָ֛ה <WH6017> and Gomorrah וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all אָכְלָ֖ם <WH400> and all their victuals וַיֵּלֵֽכוּ׃ <WH1980> and departed

וַיִּקְח֨וּ <WH3947> And they took אֶת־ <WH853> ל֧וֹט <WH3876> Lot וְאֶת־ <WH853> רְכֻשׁ֛וֹ <WH7399> and his goods בֶּן־ <WH1121> son אֲחִ֥י <WH251> brother's אַבְרָ֖ם <WH87> Abram's וַיֵּלֵ֑כוּ <WH1980> and departed וְה֥וּא <WH1931> he יֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> who dwelt בִּסְדֹֽם׃ <WH5467> in Sodom

וַיָּבֹא֙ <WH935> And there came הַפָּלִ֔יט <WH6412> one that had escaped וַיַּגֵּ֖ד <WH5046> and told לְאַבְרָ֣ם <WH87> Abram הָעִבְרִ֑י <WH5680> the Hebrew וְהוּא֩ <WH1931> now he שֹׁכֵ֨ן <WH7931> for he dwelt בְּאֵֽלֹנֵ֜י <WH436> in the plain מַמְרֵ֣א <WH4471> of Mamre הָאֱמֹרִ֗י <WH567> the Amorite אֲחִ֤י <WH251> brother אֶשְׁכֹּל֙ <WH812> of Eshcol וַאֲחִ֣י <WH251> and brother עָנֵ֔ר <WH6063> of Aner וְהֵ֖ם <WH1992> and these בַּעֲלֵ֥י <WH1167> archer בְרִית־ <WH1285> confederacy אַבְרָֽם׃ <WH87> with Abram

וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> heard אַבְרָ֔ם <WH87> And when Abram כִּ֥י <WH3588> for נִשְׁבָּ֖ה <WH7617> was taken captive אָחִ֑יו <WH251> that his brother וַיָּ֨רֶק <WH7324> he armed אֶת־ <WH853> חֲנִיכָ֜יו <WH2593> his trained יְלִידֵ֣י <WH3211> [servants] born בֵית֗וֹ <WH1004> in his own house שְׁמֹנָ֤ה <WH8083> eight עָשָׂר֙ <WH6240> teen וּשְׁלֹ֣שׁ <WH7969> three מֵא֔וֹת <WH3967> hundred וַיִּרְדֹּ֖ף <WH7291> and pursued עַד־ <WH5704> far דָּֽן׃ <WH1835> [them] unto Dan

וַיֵּחָלֵ֨ק <WH2505> And he divided עֲלֵיהֶ֧ם ׀ <WH5921> against לַ֛יְלָה <WH3915> by night ה֥וּא <WH1931> he וַעֲבָדָ֖יו <WH5650> himself against them he and his servants וַיַּכֵּ֑ם <WH5221> and smote וַֽיִּרְדְּפֵם֙ <WH7291> them and pursued עַד־ <WH5704> far חוֹבָ֔ה <WH2327> them unto Hobah אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which מִשְּׂמֹ֖אל <WH8040> which [is] on the left hand לְדַמָּֽשֶׂק׃ <WH1834> of Damascus

וַיָּ֕שֶׁב <WH7725> And he brought back אֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָרְכֻ֑שׁ <WH7399> all the goods וְגַם֩ <WH1571> and also אֶת־ <WH853> ל֨וֹט <WH3876> Lot אָחִ֤יו <WH251> his brother וּרְכֻשׁוֹ֙ <WH7399> and his goods הֵשִׁ֔יב <WH7725> and also brought again וְגַ֥ם <WH1571> and also אֶת־ <WH853> הַנָּשִׁ֖ים <WH802> and the women וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> also and the people

וַיֵּצֵ֣א <WH3318> went out מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> And the king סְדֹם֮ <WH5467> of Sodom לִקְרָאתוֹ֒ <WH7125> to meet אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> him after שׁוּב֗וֹ <WH7725> his return מֵֽהַכּוֹת֙ <WH5221> from the slaughter אֶת־ <WH853> כְּדָר־ לָעֹ֔מֶר <WH3540> of Chedorlaomer וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמְּלָכִ֖ים <WH4428> and of the kings אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who אִתּ֑וֹ <WH854> for אֶל־ <WH413> at עֵ֣מֶק <WH6010> that [were] with him at the valley שָׁוֵ֔ה <WH7740> of Shaveh ה֖וּא <WH1931> which עֵ֥מֶק <WH6010> dale הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> [is] the king's

וּמַלְכִּי־ צֶ֙דֶק֙ <WH4442> And Melchizedek מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king שָׁלֵ֔ם <WH8004> of Salem הוֹצִ֖יא <WH3318> brought forth לֶ֣חֶם <WH3899> bread וָיָ֑יִן <WH3196> and wine וְה֥וּא <WH1931> now he כֹהֵ֖ן <WH3548> and he [was] the priest לְאֵ֥ל <WH410> God עֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <WH5945> of the most high

וַֽיְבָרְכֵ֖הוּ <WH1288> And he blessed וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> him and said בָּר֤וּךְ <WH1288> Blessed אַבְרָם֙ <WH87> [be] Abram לְאֵ֣ל <WH410> God עֶלְי֔וֹן <WH5945> of the most high קֹנֵ֖ה <WH7069> possessor שָׁמַ֥יִם <WH8064> of heaven וָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> and earth

וּבָרוּךְ֙ <WH1288> And blessed אֵ֣ל <WH410> God עֶלְי֔וֹן <WH5945> be the most high אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> Who מִגֵּ֥ן <WH4042> which hath delivered צָרֶ֖יךָ <WH6862> thine enemies בְּיָדֶ֑ךָ <WH3027> into thy hand וַיִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> And he gave ל֥וֹ מַעֲשֵׂ֖ר <WH4643> him tithes מִכֹּֽל׃ <WH3605> of all

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> And the king סְדֹ֖ם <WH5467> of Sodom אֶל־ <WH413> to אַבְרָ֑ם <WH87> unto Abram תֶּן־ <WH5414> Give לִ֣י הַנֶּ֔פֶשׁ <WH5315> me the persons וְהָרְכֻ֖שׁ <WH7399> the goods קַֽח־ <WH3947> and take לָֽךְ׃

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said אַבְרָ֖ם <WH87> And Abram אֶל־ <WH413> to מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> to the king סְדֹ֑ם <WH5467> of Sodom הֲרִימֹ֨תִי <WH7311> I have lift up יָדִ֤י <WH3027> mine hand אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> unto the LORD אֵ֣ל <WH410> God עֶלְי֔וֹן <WH5945> the most high קֹנֵ֖ה <WH7069> the possessor שָׁמַ֥יִם <WH8064> of heaven וָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> and earth

אִם־ <WH518> That I will not מִחוּט֙ <WH2339> [take] from a thread וְעַ֣ד <WH5704> against שְׂרֽוֹךְ־ <WH8288> thong נַ֔עַל <WH5275> A sandal וְאִם־ <WH518> and that I will not אֶקַּ֖ח <WH3947> take מִכָּל־ <WH3605> anything אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after לָ֑ךְ וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not תֹאמַ֔ר <WH559> any thing that [is] thine lest thou shouldest say אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I הֶעֱשַׁ֥רְתִּי <WH6238> rich אֶת־ <WH853> אַבְרָֽם׃ <WH87> Abram

בִּלְעָדַ֗י <WH1107> Save רַ֚ק <WH7535> but אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> only that which אָֽכְל֣וּ <WH398> have eaten הַנְּעָרִ֔ים <WH5288> the young men וְחֵ֙לֶק֙ <WH2506> and the portion הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> of the men אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who הָלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> which went אִתִּ֑י <WH854> with עָנֵר֙ <WH6063> me Aner אֶשְׁכֹּ֣ל <WH812> Eshcol וּמַמְרֵ֔א <WH4471> and Mamre הֵ֖ם <WH1992> let them יִקְח֥וּ <WH3947> take חֶלְקָֽם׃ <WH2506> their portion ס
